alert.note: Alert for Maries; Miller; Phelps (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 1:38PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maries, southeastern Miller and northern Phelps Counties through 215 PM CDT... At 138 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles northwest of Iberia, or 13 miles southeast of Eldon, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rolla, Lake of The Ozarks State Park, St. James, Belle, Iberia, Vienna, Saint Elizabeth, St. Elizabeth, Tuscumbia, Brinktown, Ulman, Vichy, Northwye, Marys Home and Rosati. This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 187 and 200. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
